titles: A treatise of the threefolde state of man wherein is handled, 1 His created holinesse in his innocencie. 2 His sinfulnesse since the fall of Adam. 3 His renewed holinesse in his regeneration.
author: Morton, Thomas, of Berwick.
publisher: [By R. Robinson] for Robert Dexter and Raph Iackeson,
notes: By Thomas Morton of Berwick. Erroneously attributed to Bishop Thomas Morton.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
